docs.description:
Get contract by id.
				Versions of the contract also possible to retrieve with latest version as first.

schemas.description: Request to create contract

prices.description: The price per hour for employee

minHours.description: Specifies the minimum amount of hours for a booking at this price.

groupedInvoicing.description: If customer with this contract should have one invoice per order or one invoice containing all orders

schemas.description: The contract object

id.description: Readonly unique id, is set during creation

schemas.description: Response for get price for given industry and service via the service

contractId.description: Readonly unique id, is set during creation

versionId.description: Readonly unique id, is set during creation

schemas.description: Request for get contract by id via the service

contractId.description: Contract id

expand.description: Whether or not to expand contract object with its versions.

withDefaultContract.description: If to merge contract with fallback values from default contract

versionId.description: Get specific version of contract, if none is set latest version will be returned

schemas.description: Request for get contract by query via the service

query.description: mongodb like query object in a String: any fashion, e.g. { id: { $in: ['7a967d8b-8a25-4d20-b0e9-8ebe9383d488', '9f6b47c0-628c-45ca-8c43-8a99bf37e241'] }} to get users with ids '7a967d8b-8a25-4d20-b0e9-8ebe9383d488' and '9f6b47c0-628c-45ca-8c43-8a99bf37e241.'

minHours.description: Specifies the minimum amount of hours for a booking at this price.

docs.description:
Get price for given industry, service and contract.
				Default contract prices are used if given contract has not price for given industry and service.
				Used contractId and version also return

errors.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: The price cannot find for even default contract, Something unexpected happened
